data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Zubek, Anna, Lorenc-Brudecka, Jadwiga, Pyrcz, Tomasz W. (2015): Hypandrium as a key character in resolving species-level taxonomy on the example of Perisama oppelii (Latreille) (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae, Biblidinae). Zootaxa 3990 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.1.2
